source_sentence: 眾經目錄卷第二
translation: Catalogue of the Buddhist Texts, Volume II

source_sentence: 釋靜泰撰
translation: written by Shi Jingtai

source_sentence: 重翻(本是一經或有二重翻者乃至六重翻者)　合三百二十八部一千一百一十六卷大乘經重翻二百三部五百二十四卷放光般若波羅蜜經三十卷(或二十卷四百六十紙)　晉元康元年無羅叉共竺叔蘭於陳留譯光讚般若波羅蜜經十卷(或十五卷二百一十五紙)　晉太康年竺法護譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: The retranslation (originally one sūtra, there are two retranslations and even six retranslations) combines 328 parts and 1,116 volumes of great vehicle scriptures, and retranslates 200 parts and 524 volumes of the Pañcaviṃśati-sāhasrikā-prajñāpāramitā-sūtra in 30 volumes (or 20 volumes of 460 pages).

source_sentence: 道行般若波羅蜜經十卷(一百六十五紙)　後漢元和年支謙譯新道行經十卷(一名新小品經或七卷一百五十四紙)　晉太始年竺法護譯小品般若經十卷(或八卷一百五十四紙)　後秦弘始年羅什譯明度經四卷(一名大明度無極經或六卷九十一紙)右四經同本異譯。
translation: Daoxing banruo boluomi jing 10 rolls (165 pages) Later Han dynasty, in the year of Yuanhe, Zhi Qian translated the new Daoxing jing 10 rolls (a new xiaoxiao pin jing or seven rolls of 154 pages) Jin dynasty, in the year of Taishilun, Zhu Fahou translated the xiaoxiao pin banruo jing 10 rolls (or eight rolls of 154 pages) Later Qin dynasty, in the year of Hongshilun, Luoshi translated the Mingdu jing 4 rolls (a great Mingdu wujie jing or six rolls of 91 pages) The right four sūtras were translated differently from the original.

source_sentence: 悲華經十卷(一百九十四紙)　北涼沮渠蒙遜世曇無讖於姑臧譯大悲分陀利經八卷(一百六十五紙)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Compassionate Flower Scripture, Ten Fascicle (194 pages) Northern Liang Dynasty, Juqu Mengxun, and Shidan Wushan translated the Dabei fentuoli jing in Guzang, Eight Fascicle (165 pages) The right two scriptures are variant translations of the same text.

source_sentence: 念佛三昧經六卷(或五卷九十二紙)　宋大明年功德直於楊州譯大方等大集菩薩念佛三昧經十卷(一百三十二紙)隋大業年達磨笈多於東京上林園譯皇朝奏行右二經同本異譯。
translation: The Nianfo sanmei jing is a six-fascicle (or five-fascicle, ninety-two-page) translation of the Dafangdeng daji pusa nianfo sanmei jing into ten volumes (one hundred and thirty-two pages) at Yangzhou in the Ming year of the Song dynasty.

source_sentence: 大方廣十輪經八卷(或七卷一百一十紙)大乘大集地藏十輪經十卷(一百七十一紙)　唐永徽年玄奘譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: Dafangguang shilun jing eight rolls (or seven rolls of 110 pages) Dasheng daji dizang shilun jing ten rolls (171 pages) Xuanzang translator in the year of Yonghui of the Tang dynasty.

source_sentence: 妙法蓮華經七卷(或八卷一百四十八紙)　後秦弘始年羅什譯正法華經十卷(一百八十九紙)　晉太康年竺法護譯妙法蓮華經七卷　大隋仁壽元年三藏崛多譯右三經同本異譯。
translation: The Lotus Sutra of the Wonderful Dharma in Seven Fascicles (or Eight Fascicles and One Hundred Forty-Eight Pages): A Translation of the True Lotus Sutra in Ten Fascicles (One Hundred and Eighty-Nine Pages) by Rāsh in the Year of Hongsi of the Latter Qin Dynasty; The Lotus Sutra of the Wonderful Dharma in Seven Fascicles by Zhu Fahou in the Year of Taikang of Jin; The Lotus Sutra of the Wonderful Dharma in Three Treasures by Horta in the First Year of Renshou of the Sui Dynasty; A Different Translation of the Right Three Sutras.

source_sentence: 楞伽阿跋多羅經四卷(九十二紙)　宋元嘉年求那跋陀羅譯入楞伽經十卷(一百七十五紙)　後魏世菩提留支譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: Laṅkâvatāra-sūtra in 4 volumes (ninety-two pages) Kunabhadra-translation of the Laṅkâvatāra-sūtra in 10 volumes (one hundred and seventy-five pages); Bodhiruci-translation of the 2 right sūtras into the same text in a different translation in the later Wei dynasty.

source_sentence: 菩薩行方便境界神通變化經三卷(四十七紙)大薩遮尼乾子經七卷(或八卷一百三十一紙)　後魏世菩提留支譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: Sutra of the Transformation of the Bodhisattva's Practices, Methods, and Realms of Spiritual Powers: 3 volumes (forty-seven pages); Sutra of the Great Satyasiddhi Nirgrantha: 7 volumes (or 8 volumes, 131 pages); Latter Wei Dynasty Translation by Bodhiruci: the same text and a variant translation of the right two sūtras.

source_sentence: 大般泥洹經六卷(是大般涅槃經前分十卷盡大眾問品一百四十紙)　晉義熙年沙門法顯譯右一經是大般涅槃經別品殊譯。
translation: Six Fascicle Sutra on the Great Decease (This is the first ten fascicles of the Mahāparinirvāṇa Sutra, which concludes the one hundred and forty pages of the Questions of the Great People.) Translated by Faxian, an ascetic of the Jin dynasty, the right one is a translation of a special section of the Mahāparinirvāṇa Sutra.

source_sentence: 大哀經八卷(是初陀羅尼自在王菩薩品或七卷一百一十九紙)　晉元康年竺法護譯虛空藏所問經八卷(是虛空藏菩薩品或六卷一百八紙)　西秦乞伏仁世聖堅譯菩薩淨行經二卷(是寶髻菩薩品一名寶髻菩薩經四十八紙)　晉永熙年竺法護譯無盡意經六卷(或四卷亦是阿差末經八十六紙)　晉太始年竺法護譯阿差末經七卷(是無盡意品或四卷九十二紙)　晉永嘉年竺法護譯無言童子經二卷(是無言品四十一紙)　晉世竺法護譯寶女經三卷(是寶女品或四卷六十三紙)　晉太康年竺法護譯右七經是大集經別品殊譯。
translation: In the year of Yihui of the Jin dynasty, the ascetic Faxian translated the right seven sutras into a special translation of the separate section of the Mahāparinirvāṇa-sūtra.

source_sentence: 大樹緊那羅王所問經四卷(六十五紙)　後秦弘始年羅什譯伅真陀羅所問經二卷(或三卷五十七紙)　建寧年支謙譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: The Mahādruma Kiṃnara-rāja-paripṛcchā(sūtra) in four fascicles (65 pages) was translated by Rāsh in the Hongsi era of the late Qin Dynasty into two fascicles (or three fascicles of 57 pages) by Zhi Qian in the Jianning era into a variant translation of the same text for the right two sūtras.

source_sentence: 持人菩薩所問經四卷(五十二紙)　晉世竺法護譯持世經四卷(亦名法印經七十五紙)　後秦弘始年羅什譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: The Sutra of the Questions of the Bodhisattva Who Holds People in His Hands 4 volumes (52 pages) The Sutra of Holding People in His Hands 4 volumes (also called the Sutra of the Dharma Seal 75 pages) A variant translation of the right two sūtras into the same text by Rāṣṭrapāla in the Hongsi period of the later Qin dynasty.

source_sentence: 弘道廣顯三昧經四卷(五十三紙)　晉永嘉年竺法護譯阿耨達龍王經二卷(一名阿耨請佛或三卷五十二紙)　晉世竺法護譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: Hongdao guangxian sanmei jing 4 rolls (fifty-three pages) 晉永嘉年竺法護譯阿耨達龍王經二卷(一阿耨請佛或三卷五十二紙) 晉世竺法護譯右两經同本異譯。

source_sentence: 普超三昧經三卷(六十七紙)　晉太康年竺法護譯阿闍世王經二卷(五十四紙)　後漢世支謙譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: Puchao sanmei jing 3 rolls (67 pages) Translated by Zhu Fahou in the year of Taikang in Jin Dynasty as Ajātaśatru kings jing 2 rolls (54 pages) Translated by Zhi Qian in the later Han Dynasty as a variant translation of the same text for the right two sūtras.

source_sentence: 等集眾德三昧經三卷(或二卷四十九紙)　晉世竺法護譯集一切福德三昧經三卷(四十八紙)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Samādhi-sūtra on the Equal Collection of Various Virtues, 3 volumes (or 2 volumes of 49 pages) Translated by Zhu Fahou in the Jin Dynasty into 3 volumes (48 pages) The right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 聖善住意天子所問經三卷(五十五紙)　後魏世留支波若譯如幻三昧經二卷(或三卷五十六紙)　晉世竺法護譯大方等善住意天子所問經四卷(六十八紙)　隋大業年達摩笈多於東京上林園譯皇朝奏行右三經同本異譯。
translation: The Sutra of the Questions of the Emperor Shōtoku in Three Volumes (55 pages) The Rucika Sanmei Sutra in Two Volumes (or Three Volumes, 56 pages) The Sutra of the Questions of the Emperor Dōtoku in Four Volumes (68 pages) The Dharmagupta Sutra translated at the Shanglin Park in Tokyo in the Daiye year of the Sui Dynasty by the imperial court was a variant translation of the same text as the right three sūtras.

source_sentence: 廣博嚴淨不退轉輪經四卷(或六卷七十八紙)　宋元嘉年智嚴共寶雲譯不退轉法輪經四卷(七十一紙)阿惟越致遮經二卷(或四卷六十一紙)　晉太康年竺法護譯右三經同本異譯。
translation: Four Fascicle Sutra of the Nonretrogressing Wheel of Extensive Adornment (or six fascicles of seventy-eight pages) Translated by Zhiyan and Jiebao Yun in the Year of Yuanjia of the Song Dynasty Four Fascicle Sutra of the Nonretrogressing Wheel of the Dharma (or seventy-one pages) Two Fascicle Sutra of the Abhidharma (or four fascicles of sixty-one pages) Translated by Zhu Fahou in the Year of Taikang of the Jin Dynasty The right three scriptures are the same text and different translations.

source_sentence: 思益梵天問經四卷(八十二紙)　後秦弘始年羅什譯持心梵天所問經四卷(一名等御諸法一名莊嚴佛法或六卷九十四紙)　晉太康年竺法護譯勝思惟梵天所問經六卷(一百一紙)　後魏世菩提留支譯右三經同本異譯。
translation: Sutra of the Questions of Viśeṣa-cinti-brahma in Four Fascicles (eighty-two pages) Translated by Rāsh in the Year of Hongsi of the Later Qin Dynasty into Four Fascicles (One Equal to the Dharma and One Adorned by the Dharma or Six Fascicles and Ninety-four Pages) Translated by Zhu Fahou in the Year of Taikang of the Jin Dynasty into Six Fascicles (one hundred and one pages) Translated by Bodhiruci in the Later Wei Dynasty into the same text and a variant translation of the right three sūtras.

source_sentence: 漸備一切智德經五卷(一百五紙是華嚴經十地品)　晉元康年竺法護別譯十住經四卷(亦是十地品九十七紙)　後秦弘始年羅什別譯羅摩迦經三卷(入法界品七十七紙)　西秦乞伏仁世聖堅譯信力入印法門經五卷(是華嚴經別品九十五紙)　後魏世菩提留支別譯如來興顯經四卷(一名興顯如幻經是如來性起品六十七紙)　晉元康年竺法護別譯度世經六卷(是離世間品一百一十九紙)　晉元康年竺法護別譯菩薩十住經一卷(是十住品五紙)菩薩本業經一卷(是淨行品并十住品略無偈十三紙)　吳黃武年支謙別譯諸菩薩求佛本業經一卷(是淨行品十一紙)右九經是華嚴經別品殊譯。
translation: 漸備一切智德經五卷(一百五紙是華嚴經十地品)　晉元康年竺法護別譯十住經四卷(亦是十地品九十七紙)　後秦弘始年羅什別譯羅摩迦經三卷(入法界品七十七紙)　西秦乞伏仁世聖堅譯信力入印法門經五卷(是華嚴經別品九十五紙)　後魏世菩提留支別譯如來興顯經四卷(一名興顯如幻經是如來性起品六十七紙)　晉元康年竺法護別譯度世經六卷(是離世間品一百一十九紙)　晉元康年竺法護別譯菩薩十住經一卷(是十住品五紙)菩薩本業經一卷(是淨行品并十住品略無偈十三紙)　吳黃武年支謙別譯諸菩薩求佛本業經一卷(是淨行品十一紙)右九經是華嚴經別品殊譯。

source_sentence: 佛昇忉利天為母說法經二卷(或三卷三十六紙)　晉太康年竺法護譯道神足無極變化經四卷(或二卷五十一紙)　晉太康年安法欽譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: The Sutra on the Ascension of the Buddha to the Dignified Heaven to Explain the Dharma to His Mother in Two Fascicles (or Three Fascicles and Thirty-six Pieces of Paper) Translated by Zhu Fahou in the Year of Taikang of Jin Dynasty Four Fascicles (or Two Fascicles and Fifty-One Pieces of Paper) Translated by An Fachin in the Year of Taikang of Jin Dynasty The right two sūtras are variant translations of the same text.

source_sentence: 深密解脫經五卷(七十二紙)　後魏世留支譯解深密經五卷(七十三紙)　唐貞觀年玄奘譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: Sutra of the Profound Liberation Five Fascicle (72 pages) Later Wei Shiliuzhi Translation of the Sutra of the Profound Liberation Five Fascicle (73 pages) Tang Zengguan Nian Xuanzang Translation of the Right Two Sutras Same Text Different Translation.

source_sentence: 維摩詰經二卷(五十二紙)　吳黃武年支謙譯維摩詰所說經三卷(六十一紙)　後秦弘始年羅什譯說無垢稱經六卷(九十一紙)　唐貞觀年玄奘譯右三經同本異譯。
translation: Vimalakīrti-nirdeśa-sūtra 2 vols. (fifty-two pages); Vimalakīrti-nirdeśa-sūtra 3 vols. (sixty-one pages); Sautrānti-nirdeśa-sūtra 6 vols. (ninety-one pages); Xuanzang-nirdeśa-sūtra 2 vols. (ninety-one pages); and Tang-Zhengguan-nirdeśa-sūtra 3 vols.

source_sentence: 諸法無行經二卷(三十一紙)　後秦弘始年羅什譯諸法本無經三卷(三十八紙)　隋開皇年闍那崛多及笈多等於大興善寺譯　皇朝奏行右二經同本異譯。
translation: Sutra on the Non-Harmonization of the Dharma, 2 volumes (31 pages) Translated by Rāsh in the Year of Hongsi in the Later Qin Dynasty, 3 volumes (38 pages) Translated at Daxingshansi by Jñānagupta, Gupta, and others in the Kaihuang year of the Sui Dynasty, with the same text and a variant translation by the imperial court.

source_sentence: 無極寶三昧經一卷(三十紙)　晉永嘉年竺法護譯寶如來三昧經二卷(三十紙)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Wuzi baozanmei jing 1 roll (30 pages) Translated by Zhu Fahou in the year of Yongjia of the Jin dynasty into 2 rolls (30 pages) Different translations of the same text for the right two sūtras.

source_sentence: 方等泥洹經二卷(四十五紙)　晉世佛陀跋陀羅共法顯譯哀泣經二卷(三十紙)四童子經三卷(三十三紙)　隋開皇年闍那崛多及笈多等於大興善寺譯　皇朝奏行右三經同本異譯。
translation: The Nirvana Sutra of Equanimity, 2 volumes (45 pages) The Lamentation Sutra, 2 volumes (30 pages) Translated by Buddhabhadra and Faxian of the Jin Dynasty; The Four Children's Sutra, 3 volumes (33 pages) Translated at Daxingshansi by Jñānagupta, Gupta, and others in the Kaihuang year of the Sui Dynasty; Different translations of the right three sūtras from the same text by the imperial court.

source_sentence: 惠上菩薩問大善權經二卷(三十紙)　晉太康年竺法護譯大乘方便經三卷(或二卷四十一紙)　晉世竺難提譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: Huishang pusa wenda shanquan jing 2 rolls (30 pages) Translated by Zhu Fahou in the year of Taikang of Jin Dynasty Dasheng fangbian jing 3 rolls (or 2 rolls of 41 pages) Translated by Zhu Nandi in Jin Dynasty The right two sūtras are the same text and different translations.

source_sentence: 文殊師利現寶藏經三卷(三十二紙)　晉太始年竺法護譯大方廣寶篋經三卷(三十一紙)右二經同本異譯。
translation: Wenshushilipangsang jing 3 rolls (32 pages): translated by Zhu Fahou in the first year of the Jin dynasty (31 pages): the right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 奮迅王問經二卷(四十二紙)　後魏世留支譯自在王經二卷(三十四紙)　後秦弘始年羅什譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: Fenxunwang wen jing 2 rolls (forty-two pages) Later Wei shiluchi jing zizaiwang jing 2 rolls (thirty-four pages) Later Qin hong-shih nian luoshi jing The right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 大淨法門經一卷(二十四紙)　晉世竺法護譯大莊嚴法門經二卷(二十六紙)　隋開皇年耶舍譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: Dajing famen jing 1 roll (24 pages) 晉世竺法護譯 大莊嚴法門經 2 rolls (26 pages) Sui Kaihuang year Yeshe translates the right two sūtras into a variant translation of the same text.

source_sentence: 順權方便經二卷(一名轉女身菩薩經或一卷二十七紙)　晉世竺法護譯樂瓔珞莊嚴方便經一卷(二十五紙)　宋世法海譯右二經同本異譯。
translation: Shongyan fangbian fangbian jing (a female bodied bodhisattva sūtra or one volume of twenty-seven pages) Jin dynasty Zhu Fahou yi le yingluo zhuangyan fangbian jing one volume (twenty-five pages) Song dynasty Fahai yi the right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 大雲請雨經一卷(二十二紙)　後周世崛多譯大雲輪轉請雨經二卷(或一卷二十六紙)　隋開皇年耶舍譯大方等大雲請雨經一卷(十九紙)　隋開皇年闍那崛多及笈多等於大興善寺譯　皇朝奏行右三經同本異譯。
translation: Danyun wenhu jing 1 roll (22 pages) Later Zhou Dynasty Shihodo translates Danyun lunchang wenhu jing 2 rolls (or 1 roll of 26 pages) Sui Kaihuang year Yeshe translates Dafangdeng dashi wenhu jing 1 roll (19 pages) Sui Kaihuang year Jiaṇagupta, Gupta, and others translate at Daxingshansi The right three sūtras are the same text and are variant translations of the imperial court Zao Xingxing.

source_sentence: 度諸佛境界智嚴經一卷(八紙)　梁天監年曼陀羅共僧伽婆羅於楊州譯如來莊嚴智慧光明入諸佛境界經二卷(或一卷三十四紙)　後魏世菩提留支譯度諸佛境界智光嚴經一卷(十七紙)右三經同本異譯。
translation: Sarva-buddha-viṣayâvatāra-jñānâlokâlaṃkāra-paripṛcchā(sūtra) One volume (eight pages) Translated by Maṇḍala and Saṃghabhara at Yangzhou in the year of Tianshan in the Liang dynasty Two volumes (or one volume of thirty-four pages) Translated by Bodhiruci in the later Wei dynasty as Sarva-buddha-viṣayâvatāra-jñānâlokâlaṃkāra-paripṛcchā(sūtra) One volume (seventeen pages) Different translations of the same text for the right three sūtras.

source_sentence: 月光童子經一卷(更有一卷同名而卷小不足八紙)　晉世竺法護譯申日經一卷(八紙)德護長者經二卷(二十六紙)　隋開皇年耶舍譯右三經同本異譯。
translation: Yueguang dongzi jing 1 roll (there is also a second roll with the same title but the size of the roll is less than 8 pages) Jin Dynasty translator Zhu Fahou shengri jing 1 roll (8 pages) Dehuo changzhe jing 2 rolls (26 pages) Sui Kaihuangnian ye she translates the right three sūtras into a variant translation of the same text.

source_sentence: 七處三觀經一卷(或二卷十六紙)　後漢世安世高譯九橫經一卷(二紙)　後漢世安世高譯八正道經一卷(二紙)　後漢世安世高譯五陰譬喻經一卷(一名水沫所漂經二紙)　後漢安世高譯轉法輪經一卷(十紙失本)　後漢世安世高譯聖法印經一卷(二紙)　晉元康年竺法護譯雜阿含經一卷(二十一紙)不自守意經一卷(一名自守亦名一自守意一紙)戒德香經一卷(二紙)比丘聽施經一卷(一名聽施比丘經三紙)馬有三相經一卷(二紙)馬有八態譬人經一卷(一名馬有八弊惡態經二紙)比丘避女惡名欲自殺經一卷(三紙)戒相應法經一卷(二紙)禪行三十七品經一卷(二紙)右十五經並是雜阿含別品異譯。

source_sentence: 小乘論重翻譯八部三百八十八卷
translation: The eight sections of the lesser vehicle treatises are translated again into three hundred and eighty-eight volumes.

source_sentence: 阿毘達摩大毘婆沙論二百卷(三千一百九紙)　唐世玄奘譯毘婆沙八十四卷(一千二百七十八紙)　北梁世浮陀達摩共道泰譯右二論同本異譯。
translation: Abhidharma-mahāvibhāṣā-śāstra, 200 volumes (3,019 pages), Xuanzang Translation, 84 volumes (1,278 pages), and Daotai Translation, Bhūtō Shi Buddhadharma, of the Northern Liang Dynasty, both of which are translations of the same text.

source_sentence: 阿毘曇八揵度論三十卷(四百五十紙)發智論二十卷(三百六十四紙)　唐世玄奘譯右二論同本異譯。
translation: Thirty Fascicle Abhidharma-varganta-śāstra (450 pages) and Twenty Fascicle Arising of Wisdom (364 pages) Translated by Xuanzang of the Tang Dynasty into a variant translation of the same text for the right two treatises.

source_sentence: 俱舍論二十二卷(四百五十八紙)　真諦譯俱舍論三十卷(四百七十紙)　唐世玄奘譯右二論同本異譯。
translation: The Kusāya-śāstra in Twenty-two Volumes (448 pages) The True Truth Translation of the Kusāya-śāstra in Thirty Volumes (470 pages) The Tang Dynasty Xuanzang Translation of the Right Two Treatises into a Different Translation of the Same Text.

source_sentence: 部異執論一卷(九紙)　陳世真諦譯異部宗輪論一卷(九紙)　大唐玄奘譯右二論同本異譯。
translation: Buzhiyi jinglun 1 vol. (9 pages) Chen Shi Zhendi zonglun lun 1 vol. (9 pages) Great Tang Xuanzang Translation of the Right Two Treatises into a Variant Translation of the Same Text

source_sentence: 賢聖集傳(賢聖所撰翻譯有源)五十部一百八十六卷佛本行集經六十卷(八百六十二紙)　隋開皇年崛多譯撰集百緣經十卷(一百四十五紙)　吳世支謙譯陀羅尼集十卷(一名雜呪集或九卷一百八十七紙)千囀陀羅尼呪等五首一卷(一紙)　唐世玄奘譯六度集八卷(一百四十五紙)　吳世康僧會譯佛本行經七卷(一百一十四紙)　宋元嘉年寶雲譯阿育王傳七卷(或三卷一百一紙)　梁天監年僧伽婆羅於楊州譯付法藏傳六卷(或四卷七十五紙)　後魏世沙門吉迦夜共曇曜譯佛所行讚經傳五卷(一名馬鳴讚九十紙)　晉世寶雲譯禪祕要經五卷(一名禪法要七十一紙)　宋元嘉年沙門曇摩蜜多譯摩訶般若波羅蜜經鈔長安品五卷(一名須菩提品一名長安品經八十三紙)　前秦建元年沙門曇摩埤共竺佛念譯百喻集四卷(僧伽斯那撰四十四紙)　南齊永明十年求那毘地譯法句喻集四卷(一名法句本末或五卷九十二紙)　晉世沙門法炬共法立譯菩薩本緣集三卷(僧伽斯那撰五十三紙)　吳世支謙等譯僧伽羅剎集三卷(八十四紙)　前秦世沙門曇摩難提譯禪祕要法三卷(七十五紙)　後秦弘始年羅什譯法句經二卷(四十二紙)　吳世支謙譯禪法要解二卷(三十四紙)　後秦世羅什譯舊雜譬喻經二卷(三十七紙)　吳世康僧會譯雜譬喻經二卷(一名菩薩度人經二十六紙)孛經鈔集一卷(十八紙)　吳黃武年支謙譯思惟要略經一卷(一名思惟經九紙)　後漢世安世高譯佛醫經鈔一卷(四紙)　吳世竺律頭炎共支謙譯分別業報略集一卷(大勇菩薩撰七紙)　宋元嘉年求那跋摩譯龍樹菩薩為禪陀迦王說要偈一卷(十四紙一名勸發諸王要偈)　宋世求那跋摩譯雜譬喻經一卷(十紙)　後秦世羅什出道略集無明羅剎喻集一卷(二十二紙或三卷)四十二章經一卷(六紙)　後漢永平年竺法蘭等譯治禪病祕要一卷(二十八紙)　北涼世安陽侯沮渠京聲譯請賓頭盧法一卷(二紙)　後漢世安世高譯阿含口解十二因緣經一卷(七紙)　後漢世安世高譯阿毘曇五法行經一卷(十一紙)　後漢世安世高譯賓頭盧為王說法經一卷(十紙失本)賓頭盧突羅闍為優陀延王說法一卷(八紙)十二遊經一卷(五紙)迦葉結經一卷(一名迦葉集經傳九紙)　晉世竺法護譯阿育王太子法益壞目因緣經一卷(二十六紙)　前秦建元年曇摩難提興譯馬鳴菩薩傳一卷(二紙)　後秦世羅什譯龍樹菩薩傳一卷(四紙)　後秦世羅什譯提婆菩薩傳一卷(四紙)　後秦世羅什譯婆藪槃豆傳一卷(十四紙)　陳世真諦譯撰集三藏及雜藏傳一卷(八紙)四阿含慕抄二卷(四十二紙闕本訪得)　前秦世鳩磨羅佛提譯金七十論三卷(五十三紙)　此西域外道論陳世真諦譯勝宗十句義論一卷(十二紙)　大唐玄奘譯破外道四宗論一卷(五紙)　後魏菩提留支譯破外道涅槃論一卷(六紙)　後魏菩提留支譯大阿羅漢難陀蜜多法住記一卷(七紙)　唐世玄奘譯眾經目錄五卷(九十紙)見定依寫流行入藏目一卷眾經目錄卷第二
